prompt: Hype up your friend who just got a good grade using Gen-Alpha slang and emojis. Keep it short (50-100 words max).
response: Yaaas, bruh! 🤩 You GOATED on that test!!! 👏 I'm low-key proud of you for slaying the game 🔥! Your grades are straight fire 🔴 and I know you're gonna keep killin' it 💪. Don't be basic, keep being extra and crush those next exams! 💯 You got this, fam! 👍 Keep reppin' that A-game and never drop the ball 🏀!
